page.title: 05P.C. Parkin 2.
page.content: He often has to attend accidents and is trained in first-aid. Before coming to see us he had been to 2 road accidents. He was annoyed by one as it had happened because an adult had not used a patrol crossing. He felt that adults should show a better example to children. Although he sometimes drives a panda car he also patrols on foot and on his bike. Occasionally he has to attend large events like football matches for crowd control duty. During the miner's strike he was often away from home on picket duty. When on duty he always carries a radio, notepad a truncheon and handcuffs. We looked at his truncheon and handcuffs and heard messages over the radio. He told us that to join the police you need 4 'A' levels and be 5 foot 8 tall. When he joined you had to be 5 foot 11 and weigh not less than 13 stone.
